attributes.action: stop the phasing out of CFC inhalers for Asthmatics, COPD, Emphysema etc; sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many of you are finding that your new Non CFC inhalers are not working as well as the old inhalers or are infact making your asthma worse.  No, it's not just you - you are not alone.  Looking on the Internet,  I have found many people who are having problems with the new inhalers - you will find the most vocal in the USA! CFC asthma inhalers actually produce very little CFC gas compared to many other products.  If you want to save your old inhalers please sign this petition.  It's never too late!!!  Prime Minister, please take this petition seriously.  Thank you................
